payload.content: By 2026, the prompt box will be obsolete, replaced by proactive, agentic AI that observes user behavior and intervenes with actions for review.

name: By 2026, the prompt box will be obsolete, replaced by proactive, agentic AI that
content: By 2026, the prompt box will be obsolete, replaced by proactive, agentic AI that observes user behavior and intervenes with actions for review.

payload.content: The addressable market for AI will expand from $300-400 billion in software spend to $13 trillion in labor spend.

name: The addressable market for AI will expand from $300-400 billion in software spen
content: The addressable market for AI will expand from $300-400 billion in software spend to $13 trillion in labor spend.

payload.content: AI agent agency can be categorized into a five-tier model: 1) identifies problem, asks for help; 2) identifies problem, proposes solution, asks for approval; 3) identifies problem, proposes multiple solutions, recommends one; 4) identifies problem, implements solution, keeps you informed; 5) identifies problem, researches diagnosis, evaluates solutions, implements, seeks final approval (S-tier).

name: AI agent agency can be categorized into a five-tier model: 1) identifies problem
content: AI agent agency can be categorized into a five-tier model: 1) identifies problem, asks for help; 2) identifies problem, proposes solution, asks for approval; 3) identifies problem, proposes multiple solutions, recommends one; 4) identifies problem, implements solution, keeps you informed; 5) identifies problem, researches diagnosis, evaluates solutions, implements, seeks final approval (S-tier).

payload.content: Future applications will require minimal prompting as AI observes user behavior and intervenes proactively.

name: Future applications will require minimal prompting as AI observes user behavior
content: Future applications will require minimal prompting as AI observes user behavior and intervenes proactively.

payload.content: A critical shift is occurring from optimizing for human attention (visual hierarchy) to optimizing for agent parsing (data structure, API access, programmatic navigation), termed 'Machine Legibility'.

name: A critical shift is occurring from optimizing for human attention (visual hierar
content: A critical shift is occurring from optimizing for human attention (visual hierarchy) to optimizing for agent parsing (data structure, API access, programmatic navigation), termed 'Machine Legibility'.

payload.content: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) will evolve into Agent Engine Optimization (AEO) as LLM summaries become top search results and content optimizes for machine understanding.

name: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) will evolve into Agent Engine Optimization (AEO
content: Search Engine Optimization (SEO) will evolve into Agent Engine Optimization (AEO) as LLM summaries become top search results and content optimizes for machine understanding.

payload.content: By 2025, voice agents will achieve breakthroughs in healthcare (patient intake, post-surgery follow-up, psychiatry intake), banking/financial (outperforming humans on compliance), and recruiting (instant interviews for retail to mid-level roles).

name: By 2025, voice agents will achieve breakthroughs in healthcare (patient intake,
content: By 2025, voice agents will achieve breakthroughs in healthcare (patient intake, post-surgery follow-up, psychiatry intake), banking/financial (outperforming humans on compliance), and recruiting (instant interviews for retail to mid-level roles).

payload.content: Voice agent latency and accuracy have dramatically improved, with some companies deliberately slowing agents to sound more human, and multilingual/accent handling superior to humans.

name: Voice agent latency and accuracy have dramatically improved, with some companies
content: Voice agent latency and accuracy have dramatically improved, with some companies deliberately slowing agents to sound more human, and multilingual/accent handling superior to humans.

payload.content: The transition to AI autonomy will be gradual, not a step function, with ordinary users requiring final approval ~100% of the time and high-liability domains needing extended human oversight.

name: The transition to AI autonomy will be gradual, not a step function, with ordinar
content: The transition to AI autonomy will be gradual, not a step function, with ordinary users requiring final approval ~100% of the time and high-liability domains needing extended human oversight.
